intro: Glottiphyllum cultratum, commonly known as the sword leaf plant, is a species of flowering plant native to southern Africa. It produces small, yellowish flowers that bloom in clusters during the warmer months. Glottiphyllum cultratum is adapted to arid environments and requires well-drained soil and minimal water to thrive.
